headline: Prudential Financial Declares Quarterly Dividend on Common Stock
summary: NEWARK, N.J., August 05, 2025--Prudential Financial, Inc. (NYSE: PRU) announced today the declaration of a quarterly dividend of $1.35 per share of Common Stock, payable on September 11, 2025, to shareholders of record at the close of business on August 19, 2025.
